text:
British rockband Coldplay visited India only last year but they’ve left some “strings” attached to the country. A guitar signed by the band will be up for sale at a charity auction hosted by actor Rahul Bose here on February 19.

According to a statement, the band comprising Chris Martin, Jonny Buckland, Guy Berryman and Will Champion, signed and donated a very special guitar for the auction.

The guitar is the only international piece of memorabilia that will be auctioned along with 11 other pieces donated by eminent Indians. — IANS
title: Guitar signed by Coldplay for sale in Mumbai
